if(!('webkitSpeechRecognition'in window||'SpeechRecognition'in window)){setSpeechSupported(false);setError("Voice input not supported in this browser. Please use Chrome, Edge, or Safari for voice recognition, or use manual input.");return;}try{// Initialize Speech Recognition

Please speak clearly into your microphone and try again.";break;case'aborted':errorMessage="Speech recognition was interrupted. Please connect a microphone and refresh the page.";break;case'service-not-allowed':errorMessage="Speech recognition service not available. Please use manual input instead.";break;default:errorMessage="Speech recognition error (".concat(event.error,"). Please use manual input or try refreshing the page.");}setError(errorMessage);setTimeout(()=>setError(""),10000);};recognitionInstance.onend=()=>{setIsListening(false);setStatusText("");};setRecognition(recognitionInstance);}catch(err){console.error('Speech recognition initialization error:',err);setSpeechSupported(false);setError("Failed to initialize voice recognition. setError("");try{// Request microphone permission first

setTimeout(()=>{try{recognition.start();}catch(err){console.error('Recognition start error:',err);setError("Speech recognition failed to start.
